name: libDrive
description: libDrive is a Google Drive media library manager and indexer, similar to Plex, that organizes Google Drive media to offer an intuitive and user-friendly experience.

LIBDRIVE_CLOUD.description: The ID of any empty Google Drive folder. This folder will be used to store the config and metadata generated by libDrive

LIBDRIVE_CONFIG.description: Create this through the config generator: https://config.libdrive.tk. Make sure to read the meaning of each variable on the wiki: https://github.com/libDrive/libDrive/wiki/Config

LIBDRIVE_VERSION.description: The version to deploy (e.g. v1.3.10). 'latest' and 'dev' are also accepted, 'latest' automatically updates libDrive on each restart. 'dev' builds libDrive using the latest commit, this will only be built once, on the first deploy

PINGER.description: The pinger pings your app every 15 minutes to prevent it from sleeping. Input the URL of your app (e.g. https://APP_NAME.herokuapp.com). Leave empty if you don't want to use the pinger

PINGER_INTERVAL.description: How often, in seconds, the pinger will be used

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: Don't change this, leave the value as 1
